meta.name: Trustpilot Review Sentiment Analysis with OpenAI & Bright Data to Google Sheets

parameters.text:
=`You are a web scraper connected to Bright Data's MCP tool using the scrape_as_markdown function.

Scrape the latest 5 reviews from the Trustpilot company page at this URL:
{{ $json.URL }}

Use the scrape_as_markdown tool with these parameters:
{
  "url": {{ $json.URL }},
  "max_items": 5
}

After scraping, analyze each review and return a JSON array of 5 objects with these fields:

- reviewer (string)
- date (string)
- rating (number)
- sentiment (one of "positive", "neutral", or "negative")
- mainIssue (string â€” summarize complaint or praise)
- reviewText (string)

Return only valid JSON.
`
